pages.title: Welcome to Liveblocks
pages.description: Learn how to build realtime collaborative applications using React, Next.js, TypeScript, and Liveblocks. Liveblocks is a realtime collaboration infrastructure for building performant collaborative experiences.

pages.title: Connecting to Liveblocks
pages.description: Learn how to create a Liveblocks realtime client, and then connect to it with the JavaScript createClient function.

pages.title: Joining a room
pages.description: Learn how to join a Liveblocks room in your React collaborative application, using the RoomProvider component.

pages.title: Displaying others
pages.description: Learn how to use Liveblocks others to display online presence in your collaborative React application with useOthers.

pages.title: Using presence
pages.description: Learn how to set up and use the current user’s Liveblocks Presence values in your collaborative React application with useMyPresence.

pages.title: Updating presence
pages.description: Learn how to update the current user’s Liveblocks Presence values in your multiplayer React application with updateMyPresence.

pages.title: Live cursors using presence
pages.description: Learn how to build realtime cursors with Liveblocks Presence values in your collaborative React application with useOthers.

pages.title: Broadcasting events
pages.description: Learn how to broadcast realtime toast notification events using Liveblocks and useBroadcastEvent in your React application.

pages.title: Storage
pages.description: Learn how to create realtime document storage in React with Liveblocks’ conflict-free data types and the useStorage hook.

pages.title: Modifying storage data
pages.description: Learn how to modify realtime conflict-free data storage with the Liveblocks useMutation React hook.

pages.title: Nesting data types
pages.description: Learn how to nest Liveblocks realtime conflict-free data types within each other, enabling more complex React applications.
